dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".
dependencies.name: py-appdirs

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir"
dependencies.name: py-platformdirs

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools-scm

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Python ARM Radar Toolkit. A growing collection of weather radar
algorithms and utilities build on top of the Scientific Python stack and
distributed under the 3-Clause BSD license. Py-ART is used by the
Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) Climate Research Facility for
working with data from a number of precipitation and cloud radars, but
has been designed so that it can be used by others in the radar and
atmospheric communities to examine, processes, and analyse data from
many types of weather radars.
dependent_to.name: py-arm-pyart

dependent_to.description: A python package for music and audio analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-librosa

dependent_to.description:
Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.
dependent_to.name: py-metpy

dependent_to.description: MNE python project for MEG and EEG data analysis.
dependent_to.name: py-mne

dependent_to.description: Create masks of geospatial regions for arbitrary grids
dependent_to.name: py-regionmask

dependent_to.description:
Image processing algorithms for SciPy, including IO, morphology,
filtering, warping, color manipulation, object detection, etc.
dependent_to.name: py-scikit-image

dependent_to.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependent_to.name: py-scipy

dependent_to.description: N-D labeled arrays and datasets in Python
dependent_to.name: py-xarray

description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.
name: py-pooch

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
